a.title: Return to the homepage on the district site.

h1.span: School closure extended to the end of the 2019-20 school year

span.h2: School closure extended to the end of the 2019-20 school year
span.p: Please check your email or go online for an important message from Superintendent Greene regarding the extended closure of the Yakima School District https://www.smore.com/yez1v

div.class: ui-clear facebook-true youtube-false twitter-true pinterest-false vimeo-false flickr-false linkedin-true instagram-true

div.span: The Yakima School District is a Drug Free, Weapons Free, Tobacco Free district. Yakima School District encourages workforce diversity and complies with all state and federal laws prohibiting unlawful discrimination.

ul.li: Blackboard Web Community Manager Privacy Policy (Updated) |
